purpleculture_pinyin:
lián
ripple; tearful
рябь; слезливый
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 涟)
Pictophonetic: 連 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
漣漪 [ lián yī ]: ripple
漣水 [ lián shuǐ ]: Lianshui county in Huai'an 淮安 , Jiangsu
漣水縣 [ lián shuǐ xiàn ]: Lianshui county in Huai'an 淮安 , Jiangsu
漣源 [ lián yuán ]: Lianyuan county level city in Loudi 娄底 , Hunan
漣源市 [ lián yuán shì ]: Lianyuan county level city in Loudi 娄底 , Hunan
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 連 [ lián ] to join, to connect; continuous; even
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: As the tsunami hits your scooter and your car, it alters the wave, creating ripples.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: They're hard to see because a tsunami is pretty big, but your scooter and car do create ripples in the water as it goes past.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Ripples come off of your scooter and car from when they were hit by a tsunami. More importantly, those things were rentals (れん), so ripples or not, it doesn't matter if they were hit by a tsunami.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: As you watch the ripples come off your car / scooter, be sure to imagine the relief you'd feel if you knew they were rentals and not something owned by you.
Ru_trainchinese: lián: (графема) (книжн.) рябь (на воде); (о слезах) литься без остановки
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the water (氵) that takes (連) you has ripples
humanum_full_description_en:
From " water " to " continuous " sound. "Shuowen" thought it was the or form of " Lan ". "Said Wen": "Lan, big waves are lan. From water, lansheng. Lian, lan or Conglian." Duan Yucai's note: "Ancient lan, together with sound, so Lan and Lian are the same word."

" Ripple " said that they wind ripples the water formed. "Guang Yun. "Xian Yun": "Lipples, ripples, wind and water." Such as "Poem. Wei Feng. "Fasting Sandalwood": "The river is clear and rippled." Mao Chuan: "The popular water is called the "Lian"." Lu Guimeng of the Tang Dynasty "Jiangnan Song": "Fish plays with lotus leaves in the north, and Chengyang moves slightly.

" Lian " also said that the tears flow more than the appearance. Such as "Poetry. Wei Feng. "Mang": "If you don't see the reunification, weep and tear." Lu Deming explained: "Lianlian, weeping appearance." Li Bai of the Tang Dynasty "Yuhuyin": "Three cups of sword dancing on the autumn moon, suddenly high chanting Silian."
humanum_short_description_en: From " water " to " continuous " sound. Represents the ripples formed by the wind blowing on the water surface.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「連」聲。《說文》以為是「瀾」的或體。《說文》：「瀾，大波為瀾。从水，闌聲。漣，瀾或从連。」段玉裁注：「古闌、連同音，故瀾、漣同字。」

　　「漣」多表示風吹水面形成的波紋。《廣韻．仙韻》：「漣，漣漪，風動水皃。」如《詩．魏風．伐檀》：「河水清且漣猗。」毛傳：「風行水成文曰漣。」唐代陸龜蒙〈江南曲〉：「魚戲蓮葉北，澄陽動微漣。」

　　「漣」又表示淚流不止貌。如《詩．衛風．氓》：「不見復關，泣涕漣漣。」陸德明釋文：「漣漣，泣貌。」唐代李白〈玉壺吟〉：「三杯拂劍舞秋月，忽然高詠涕泗漣。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「連」聲。表示風吹水面形成的波紋。

Pinyin: lián
English Definition: ripple; tearful

Pictophonetic: 連 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.

    • 連 [ lián ] to join, to connect; continuous; even

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 連 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
Kanshudo mnemonic:the water (氵) that takes (連) you has ripples
Hanzi: 涟

從「 水 」，「 連 」聲。《說文》以為是「 瀾 」的或體。《說文》：「瀾，大波為瀾。从水，闌聲。漣，瀾或从連。」段玉裁注：「古闌、連同音，故瀾、漣同字。」 「 漣 」多表示風吹水面形成的波紋。《廣韻．仙韻》：「漣，漣漪，風動水皃。」如《詩．魏風．伐檀》：「河水清且漣猗。」毛傳：「風行水成文曰漣。」唐代陸龜蒙〈江南曲〉：「魚戲蓮葉北，澄陽動微漣。」 「 漣 」又表示淚流不止貌。如《詩．衛風．氓》：「不見復關，泣涕漣漣。」陸德明釋文：「漣漣，泣貌。」唐代李白〈玉壺吟〉：「三杯拂劍舞秋月，忽然高詠涕泗漣。」
From " water" to " continuous" sound. "Shuowen" thought it was the or form of " Lan". "Said Wen": "Lan, big waves are lan. From water, lansheng. Lian, lan or Conglian." Duan Yucai's note: "Ancient lan, together with sound, so Lan and Lian are the same word." " Ripple" said that they wind ripples the water formed. "Guang Yun. "Xian Yun": "Lipples, ripples, wind and water." Such as "Poem. Wei Feng. "Fasting Sandalwood": "The river is clear and rippled." Mao Chuan: "The popular water is called the "Lian"." Lu Guimeng of the Tang Dynasty "Jiangnan Song": "Fish plays with lotus leaves in the north, and Chengyang moves slightly. " Lian" also said that the tears flow more than the appearance. Such as "Poetry. Wei Feng. "Mang": "If you don't see the reunification, weep and tear." Lu Deming explained: "Lianlian, weeping appearance." Li Bai of the Tang Dynasty "Yuhuyin": "Three cups of sword dancing on the autumn moon, suddenly high chanting Silian."

漣字的基本解释

漣
lián
见“涟”。

漣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《廣韻》力延切，平仙，來。］
“涟1”的繁体字。
(1)水面因风吹而形成的波纹。亦指微波。
(2)泪流不断貌。
(3)黏。
(4)水名。在江苏省涟水县北，一名涟河，又称沭水。流经沭阳县境，分中涟、东涟、西涟，潴桑墟湖，东入东海。参阅《元和郡县志·泗州》、清顾祖禹《读史方舆纪要·江南四·淮安府》。
(5)水名。在湖南省中部，源出涟源市，东流经湘乡市，至湘潭市注入湘江。
(6)水名。在广东省南雄县境内。
[②]［lán］
［《集韻》郎干切，平寒，來。］
同“瀾1”。“涟2”的繁体字。
大波。

漣字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　漣； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页646第21
【唐韻】力延切【集韻】【韻會】陵延切【正韻】靈年切，?音連。風行水上成文曰漣。【詩·魏風】河水淸且漣猗。　又垂涕貌。【詩·衞風】泣涕漣漣。　又水名。【水經注】漣水，出邵陵縣界。　又桂陽有漣水。【水經注】漣水源出桂陽縣西北之石塘村。　又【郡縣志】沭水俗名漣水。　又【韻會】郎干切，音闌。與瀾同。大波也。

考證：〔【郡縣志】沐水俗名漣水。〕　謹照原文沐改沭。

ripple
Basic explanation of words
ripple
lián
See "Lian".
ripple
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lián］
["Guangyun" Li Yanqie, Pingxian, come. ]
The traditional characters of "Lian1".
(1) The ripples on the water surface caused by wind. Also refers to microwave.
(2) The tears flow constantly.
(3) Sticky.
(4) Water name. In the north of Lianshui County, Jiangsu Province, there is a Lianhe River, also known as Shushui. Flowing through Shuyang County, it is divided into Zhonglian, Donglian, Xilian, Zhusangxu Lake, and east into the East China Sea. See "Yuanhe County Annals·Sizhou", Qing Gu Zuyu’s "Minutes of Reading History Fangyu·Jiangnan Four·Huai'an Mansion".
(5) Water name. In the central part of Hunan Province, it originates from Lianyuan City, flows through Xiangxiang City in the east, and flows into Xiangjiang River to Xiangtan City.
(6) Water name. In Nanxiong County, Guangdong Province.
[②]［lán］
["Ji Yun" Lang Ganqie, Ping Han, come. ]
Same as "Lan 1". The traditional characters of "Lian 2".
Big wave.
ripple
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　 Lian; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 646-21
【Tang Yun】Li Yanqie 【Jiyun】【Yunhui】Ling Yanqie 【Zhengyun】Lingen cut,? Yinlian. Fengxing water is written as Lian. 【Poetry·Wei Feng】The river water is turbulent and rippled.　Dropping face again. [Poetry·Weifeng] Weeping tears.　Also known as water. 【Notes on Water Classics】Lianshui, exits the boundary of Shaoling County.　There are Lianshui in Guiyang. [Water Classic] The source of Lianshui is Shitang Village in the northwest of Guiyang County.　 [County and County Chronicles] Shushui is commonly known as Lianshui.　[Yunhui] Lang Qianqie again, sound slanted. Same as Lan. Big wave also. Research: [[County and County Chronicles] Mushui's common name is Lianshui. 〕 　 I would like to change according to the original text.

ripple
Name meaning
Nothing.
lián, lán
вм. 涟
Radicals: 氵, 車  (tsunami, car, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
As the tsunami hits your scooter and your car, it alters the wave, creating ripples.
They're hard to see because a tsunami is pretty big, but your scooter and car do create ripples in the water as it goes past.
Reading Mnemonic
Ripples come off of your scooter and car from when they were hit by a tsunami. More importantly, those things were rentals (れん), so ripples or not, it doesn't matter if they were hit by a tsunami.
As you watch the ripples come off your car / scooter, be sure to imagine the relief you'd feel if you knew they were rentals and not something owned by you.
